titles.title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to increase the income eligibility limit for medical assistance for COBRA continuation coverage under a State medicaid plan from 100 percent to 185 percent of the poverty level.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E3121)

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

bill.summary: 11/22/1993--Introduced. Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to increase the income eligibility limit for COBRA continuation coverage under a State Medicaid plan.
